name: Escape the Narrative
description:
My First Jam Ever!  :-)   --- DO NOT play on fullscreen!

Pacman meets Text Adventure. - A GameJam Escape Special

Theme: Escape      Special Object: A book

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You Died.

A simple book. A Saturday night. You didn't have a date. You didn’t have plans.

But you had a book.

It’s hard to remember what happened. You were in your chair, next to the fire, cup of wine in one hand, book in the other. 

You remember it was an awkward book with an awkward story…

A story about paper bugs?

You wake up inside the book? Paper bugs are trying to eat you.

What should you do?
